quotes: In 2002 Doctor Yudhoyono became the principal founder of the Partai Demokrat
The Partai Demokrat’s success eventually enabled him to challenge for and win the Presidency of Indonesia in 2004
While still a Minister under President Megawati, Doctor Yudhoyono oversaw the hunt for and arrest of those responsible for the October 2002 Bali bombing
Early on in his Presidency, Doctor Yudhoyono faced the aftermath of the greatest natural disaster to befall Indonesia in more than a century, when the ‘Boxing Day’ tsunami struck in 2004
Following this disaster, Doctor Yudhoyono managed to bring about significant improvement in Indonesia’s economy, despite the global financial crisis in 2008
His successes saw him returned to office in the 2009 Presidential elections
In the period 2009 to 2013 his government’s policies resulted in Indonesia experiencing high economic growth second only
